<<<api>>>: StringTokenizer.nextToken
<<<code>>>:
StringTokenizer st1=new StringTokenizer(s2);
for(int k=0;k<n2;k++){
a[j][k]=Integer.parseInt(st1.nextToken());
}
<<<explanation>>>:
The StringTokenizer.nextToken() method returns the next token from a string.
